author: Z.B. Steele
description:
Gloomy, grief-centric, poetic, and bittersweet, Toll the Hounds is the shining onyx gem of Steven Erikson’s Malazan. Never before has there been a novel so beautifully melancholic and exhilaratingly epic. Toll the Hounds is not only the best Malazan novel, nor is it only one of the finest fantasy novels ever penned: this is a […]

The post REVIEW: Toll the Hounds by Steven Erikson appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Toll the Hounds by Steven Erikson

author: Rai Furniss-Greasley
description:
This year represents the 10th Anniversary of Saga Press and to celebrate they’ve introduced the Saga Double format. These have two books in one and Red Star Hustle / Apprehension is the third to be published and features two sci-fi crime tales by Sam J.
